black.content: You finished all the coffee! What do your co-workers need from you? _
You are running late on a deadline that is due to your supervisor tomorrow. What do you need from your supervisor?_
Your co-worker is nervous about their next lesson/presentation. What does your co-worker need from you?_
Your co-worker drove all the way to Pine Valley Central School, just to hear that their lesson is cancelled due to a “very important” assembly. What does your co-worker need from you?_
You are running late on a deadline that is due to your supervisor tomorrow. What does your supervisor need from you? _
Your office buddy/neighbor is being a bit too noisy. What do you need from your office neighbor?  _
Your co-worker is having trouble accessing their files on their computer. What does your co-worker need from you? _
Oh no!! You FORGOT WAGNER! What do you need to access within yourself??_
Your co-worker sent out a mass email with some errors in it. What does your co-worker need from you?_
A student burst into tears in the middle of your class. What do you need from the teacher?_
Your trainer is mad boring right now!!! What does your trainer need from you?_
